SELECT c.category_seq, COUNT(*) count FROM learn_record l INNER JOIN quiz q ON l.quiz_seq = q.quiz_seq INNER JOIN (SELECT category_seq, know_seq FROM knowledge) AS c ON c.know_seq = q.know_seq WHERE is_right = 0 AND l.user_seq=#{userSeq} GROUP BY category_seq ORDER BY count, category_seq LIMIT 0,1;
